column5: ....A couple of news items from the MNR.

thanks,spiel  now i have to inquire about the ottawa river there is also new regs,for there as well something like the opener being delayed 2 weeks and you cant keep one over 22inches for the first 3 weeks or until june 15th it sounds quite complicated..i fish there all the time and its gonna be the locals that wont abide by it,or even bother to check.if you know about the change  please let me know....i surfed around and didnt find any info...cheers
definatly alot of changes on the West Arm.... Now Div 27    Thanks Spiel.  Gerritt.
The changes for Nipissing stood out for me too, esp. given the Lakair g2g and the Nipissing fans on the board.  Thanks for posting it...  Mike

Thanks Spiel,read most of it,unfortunatly some of the info provided my MNR is innacurate Some numbers are inflated to the true actuallness of it all,although it sheds some light it lacks accuracy to the true reality of what is truth.
